title: Installation instructions
pageContent:
### iPhone (iOS)

1. In Safari, tap the "share" icon at the bottom of the screen

   ![iOS installation instructions screenshot step 1](/content/media/install-ios-step1.png)
2. Select "Add to Home Screen"

   ![iOS installation instructions screenshot step 2](/content/media/install-ios-step2.png)

### Android

1. In Google Chrome, tap the "3 dots" icon at the top right of the screen

   ![Android installation instructions screenshot step 1](/content/media/install-android-step1.jpg)
2. Select "Install app"

   ![Android installation instructions screenshot step 2](/content/media/install-android-step2.jpg)
